extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITES    (12.0 units in POLS at the 200-level or above) and (a GPA of 2.0 in all POLS units),  or permission of the Department .
EXCLUSION  No more than 3.0 units from POLS391/3.0; POLS393/3/0

basic.description: This course introduces students to the various families of electoral systems in use around the world. It examines their variations and assesses the consequences of electoral systems on political parties, legislatures and governments.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Introduction to Electoral Systems
